<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game Version (number surrounded by NO SPACES)</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mine: [[Object]] - The mine object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
